MagicCat001_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat001_ItemExp.text: There's something glorious about its slender body and wild facial features!

MagicCat002_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat002_ItemExp.text: Its big, widely spaced eyes and tiny nose are just to die for!

MagicCat003_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat003_ItemExp.text: Its almond-shaped eyes and feral countenance are magnificent!

MagicCat004_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat004_ItemExp.text: The leopardlike appearance of this cat speaks to its wild roots. So marvelous!

MagicCat005_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat005_ItemExp.text: Its long limbs and slim build give this cat an elegant appearance!

MagicCat006_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat006_ItemExp.text: Wow, its tail is just a little nub! I had no idea there were cats without tails!

MagicCat007_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat007_ItemExp.text: This kitty's heart-shaped face and silver coat are just breathtaking!

MagicCat008_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat008_ItemExp.text: This cat boasts a perfect amount of fat atop its muscular frame!

MagicCat009_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat009_ItemExp.text: This cat's colorpoint fur and sapphire-blue eyes give a new definition to 'lovely'!

MagicCat010_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat010_ItemExp.text: This stocky kitty's most gallant features are its thick chest and broad shoulders!

MagicCat011_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat011_ItemExp.text: Aw, you've never seen a cat this small! How precious!

MagicCat012_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat012_ItemExp.text: Look how those little ears fold forward! Adorbs!

MagicCat013_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat013_ItemExp.text: Just look at those widdle white paws! It's like the kitty's wearing snowshoes!

MagicCat014_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat014_ItemExp.text: It looks so dashing with its solid build and soft, curly hair!

MagicCat015_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat015_ItemExp.text: One look at that tapered face makes me swoon! And those big eyes and ears? Outrageous!

MagicCat016_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat016_ItemExp.text: What big, round eyesâ€”and those long legs are just to die for!

MagicCat017_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat017_ItemExp.text: This slender, elegant beauty would be the belle of any ball!

MagicCat018_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat018_ItemExp.text: This cat's sapphire-blue eyes and mystical features take your breath away!

MagicCat019_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat019_ItemExp.text: The coolest cat around! It's amazing how much muscle is packed into that tiny frame!

MagicCat020_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat020_ItemExp.text: The combination of Persian and Siamese features makes this cat devastatingly attractive!

MagicCat021_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat021_ItemExp.text: Look at that round head! And those big eyes! Oh, and the lovely glossy hair!

MagicCat022_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat022_ItemExp.text: This cat's almond-shaped eyes and leopardlike appearance are magnificent!

MagicCat023_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat023_ItemExp.text: This cat's muscular silhouette and pantherlike visage are to die for!

MagicCat024_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat024_ItemExp.text: Aww, who has widdle legs and a widdle round face? That's wight! You do!

MagicCat025_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat025_ItemExp.text: Man alive, this thing is MASSIVE!

MagicCat026_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat026_ItemExp.text: This kitty's so cute you might think it's a plushie! And look at those piercing blue eyes!

MagicCat027_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat027_ItemExp.text: This cat's long coat and upward-slanting eyes are cute as can be! And it's SO fluffy!

MagicCat028_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat028_ItemExp.text: Look at that well-proportioned frame and curly hair! Jealous!

MagicCat029_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat029_ItemExp.text: Have you ever seen anything like this cat's rippling coat of hair? Outstanding!

MagicCat030_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat030_ItemExp.text: This cat is notable for having a head shaped like an upside-down pear. I love it!

MagicCat031_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat031_ItemExp.text: This cat's Siamese-like appearance and soft, long hair are just marvelous!

MagicCat032_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat032_ItemExp.text: Its short, tightly packed fur and muscular build are as handsome as can be!

MagicCat033_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat033_ItemExp.text: How can it be so fluffy and yet so...BURLY!? Just gorgeous!

MagicCat034_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat034_ItemExp.text: The rounded tips of the ears... The sharp eyes... Incredible, I say!

MagicCat035_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat035_ItemExp.text: The slim body! The tight curls of its fur! Adorable from tip to toe!

MagicCat036_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat036_ItemExp.text: The lack of fur and wrinkled skin give this cat a beauty all its own!

MagicCat037_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat037_ItemExp.text: One look at those stout limbs attached to that roly-poly frame is enough to make anyone swoon!

MagicCat038_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat038_ItemExp.text: This cat's slightly rounded triangular head and blue eyes are beyond words!

MagicCat039_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat039_ItemExp.text: The tiny legs! The solid frame! The curled ears! How can something this cute exist!?

MagicCat040_ItemExp.speaker: UI
MagicCat040_ItemExp.text: Its long hind legs and kinked tail make it look like a rabbit! I love it!
